name: Platform Jackson - Jumpy Kid in Wonderland
name_original: Platform Jackson - Jumpy Kid in Wonderland
description:
Addictive Endless Jumping Platformer Game.

You are Platform Jackson A Plumber Wanna be without a moustache, the stunning and Divine platform jumper of all time.

Platform Jackson gone mad and just can not stop but jump and bounce around so you need to control him and help him land on his feet correctly.

GAME FEATURES

*Classic Action Platformer Game with Easy Touch Controls.
*Addictive and Juicy Game Play.
*Endless Runner With Jumping Action.
*Flat and Simple Easy Going Graphic Design.
*Leaderboards and Achievements.
*Fun For All Ages.
*Easy To Play with One Hand Touch intuitive controls. Play it in public transports, subway, buses etc easily with one hand.
*Compete Your Score With Your Friends and Be The Highest Jumper Of All The Super Platform Worlds.

Enjoy The Game!

If you live any issues with the game please do not write bad reviews but send your comments to the developer email The issues will be fixed quickly.
